description: Episode of Series "Exploring the body" Illustrates the growth and care of teeth, from the formation of milk teeth to their replacement by permanent teeth. Describes the inner structure of teeth and the dental treatment of decay and application of braces to correct the position of the teeth. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
